TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Grammar extends System.Object

summary.span: A runtime object that references a speech recognition grammar, which an application can use to define the constraints for speech recognition.

span.span: A runtime object that references a speech recognition grammar, which an application can use to define the constraints for speech recognition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 语音识别语法是一组规则或约束定义语音识别引擎可以识别为有意义的输入。A speech recognition grammar is a set of rules or constraints that define what a speech recognition engine can recognize as meaningful input. 有关创建和使用语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[语音识别](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919)，[使用 XML 创建语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2d799487-49c6-4cc9-b42f-f71cd3824fe1)，[创建语法使用 GrammarBuilder](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae)，并[创建使用 SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906)。For more information about creating and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919), [Create Grammars Using XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2d799487-49c6-4cc9-b42f-f71cd3824fe1), [Create Grammars Using GrammarBuilder](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae), and [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906). 创作语法后，必须生成到对象语音识别引擎可以加载和应用程序可以使用在运行时管理语音识别。After you author a grammar, you must build it into a object that a speech recognition engine can load and that your application can use at runtime to manage speech recognition. 可以使用构造函数来创建实例与或对象，或从文件或包含受支持的格式语法的说明。You can use a constructor to create a instance from a or a object, or from a file or a that contains a description of a grammar in a supported format. 支持的格式如下所示：Supported formats include the following: - 符合 W3C 的 XML 格式文件[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 已编译为.cfg 文件扩展名的二进制文件的语法Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension 语法构造函数接受其参数中的 XML 格式语法文件编译到要由语音识别引擎加载和使用情况进行优化的二进制格式的 XML 语法。Grammar constructors that accept XML-format grammar files in their arguments compile the XML grammars to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine. 可以减少构建所需的时间量对象从一种 XML 格式语法通过编译语法，请提前使用之一方法。You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the methods. 应用程序的语音识别引擎，因为由管理或对象，可以加载多个语音识别语法。An application's speech recognition engine, as managed by a or object, can load multiple speech recognition grammars. 应用程序可以单独启用或禁用各个语法通过设置属性，并修改通过识别行为属性，如和属性。The application can independently enable or disable individual grammars by setting the property, and modify recognition behavior through properties, such as the and properties. 语法的输入匹配通过语法的路径时引发事件。The grammar’s event is raised when input matches a path through the grammar. > [!NOTE] > 若要验证的任何 URI 或用于生成的 DLL 安全性最佳做法是对象。It is a best practice to verify the safety of any URI or DLL used to build a object. > > Windows 和语音平台提供了构建的应用程序的安全性实例从 DLL 或从支持的脚本的语法。Windows and the Speech platform provide security for applications constructing a instance from a DLL or from a grammar that supports scripting. > > 在脚本始终运行对象，如同从网页中下载`Internet Zone`。Scripts in objects are always run as if downloaded from a web page in the `Internet Zone`. 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 将加载获取语法定义任何 DLL 中隔离出来。The Common Language Runtime (CLR) isolates any DLL loaded to obtain a grammar definition. ## Examples 下面的示例构造从语音识别语法的 XML 文件 (cities.xml) 中定义的对象。The following example constructs a object from a speech recognition grammar defined in a XML file (cities.xml). Cities.xml 文件的内容显示在下面的 XML 示例。The content of the cities.xml file appears in the following XML example. ```csharp // Load a cities grammar from a local file and return the grammar object. private static Grammar CreateGrammarFromFile() { Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(@"c:\temp\cities.xml"); citiesGrammar.Name = "SRGS File Cities Grammar"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用构造函数来创建实例与或对象，或从文件或包含受支持的格式语法的说明。You can use a constructor to create a instance from a or object, or from a file or a that contains a description of a grammar in a supported format. 支持的格式如下所示：Supported formats include the following: - 符合 W3C 的 XML 格式文件[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 已编译为.cfg 文件扩展名的二进制文件的语法Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension 语法构造函数接受其参数中的 XML 格式语法文件编译到要由语音识别引擎加载和使用情况进行优化的二进制格式的 XML 语法。Grammar constructors that accept XML-format grammar files in their arguments compile the XML grammars to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine. 可以减少构建所需的时间量对象从一种 XML 格式语法通过编译语法，请提前使用之一方法。You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the methods. 语音识别语法可以定义根规则。A speech recognition grammar can define a root rule. 若要创建对象，它指定要作为其根规则，使用哪个规则使用构造函数接受`ruleName`参数。To create a object that specifies which rule to use as its root rule, use a constructor that accepts the `ruleName` parameter. 若要创建指定一个基 URI 来解析相对规则引用的对象使用的构造函数的`baseUri`参数。To create a object that specifies a base URI to resolve relative rule references, use a constructor that takes the `baseUri` parameter.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不将任何参数传递到初始化处理程序，并说明不应定义需要自变量的初始化处理程序。This constructor does not pass any parameters to the initialization handler, and the description should not define an initialization handler that requires arguments. 此构造函数可以创建实例从以下格式：This constructor can create a instance from the following formats: - 符合 W3C 的 XML 格式文件[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 已编译为.cfg 文件扩展名的二进制文件的语法Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension 此构造函数将编译到要由语音识别引擎加载和使用情况进行优化的二进制格式的 XML 格式语法文件。This constructor compiles XML-format grammar files to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine. 可以减少构建所需的时间量对象从一种 XML 格式语法通过编译语法，请提前使用之一方法。You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the methods. SRGS 语法可以定义根规则。An SRGS grammar can define a root rule. 若要创建从流对象和指定根规则，请使用或构造函数。To create a object from a stream and specify a root rule, use the or constructor. 若要创建从流对象，并指定要用来解析相对规则引用的基 URI 使用构造函数。To create a object from a stream and specify a base URI to use to resolve relative rule references, use the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例创建从本地 SRGS 文件 (cities.xml) 将文件流的语音识别语法。The following example creates a speech recognition grammar from a local SRGS file (cities.xml) using a file stream. 以下 C# 示例将显示 cities.xml 文件的内容。The content of the cities.xml file appears following C# example. ```csharp // Load a cities grammar from an I/O stream and // return the new grammar. private static Grammar CreateGrammarFromStream() { string fileName = @"c:\temp\cities.xml"; Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(new FileStream(fileName, FileMode.Open)); citiesGrammar.Name = "Stream Cities Grammar"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不将任何参数传递到初始化处理程序，并说明不应定义需要自变量的初始化处理程序。This constructor does not pass any parameters to the initialization handler, and the description should not define an initialization handler that requires arguments. 此构造函数可以创建实例从以下格式：This constructor can create a instance from the following formats: - 符合 W3C 的 XML 格式文件[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 已编译为.cfg 文件扩展名的二进制文件的语法Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension 此构造函数将编译到要由语音识别引擎加载和使用情况进行优化的二进制格式的 XML 格式语法文件。This constructor compiles XML-format grammar files to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine. 可以减少构建所需的时间量对象从一种 XML 格式语法通过编译语法，请提前使用之一方法。You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the methods. SRGS 语法可以定义根规则。An SRGS grammar can define a root rule. 若要创建对象从一个字符串，并指定根规则，请使用构造函数。To create a object from a string and specify a root rule, use the constructor. 若要创建指定要用来解析相对规则引用的基 URI 的对象打开的文件在文件流，并使用构造函数。To create a object that specifies a base URI to use to resolve relative rule references, open the file in a file stream and use the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例从本地 SRGS 文件生成加载语音识别语法对象。The following example loads a speech recognition grammar from a local SRGS file to build a object. Cities.xml 文件的内容显示在下面的 C# 示例的 XML 示例。The content of the cities.xml file appears in the XML example that follows the C# example. ```csharp // Load a cities grammar from a local file and // return the new grammar. private static Grammar CreateGrammarFromFile() { Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(@"c:\temp\cities.xml"); citiesGrammar.Name = "SRGS File Cities Grammar"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不将任何参数传递到初始化处理程序，并说明不应定义需要自变量的初始化处理程序。This constructor does not pass any parameters to the initialization handler, and the description should not define an initialization handler that requires arguments. 此构造函数可以创建实例从以下格式：This constructor can create a instance from the following formats: - 符合 W3C 的 XML 格式文件[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 已编译为.cfg 文件扩展名的二进制文件的语法Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension 此构造函数将编译到要由语音识别引擎加载和使用情况进行优化的二进制格式的 XML 格式语法文件。This constructor compiles XML-format grammar files to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine. 可以减少构建所需的时间量对象从一种 XML 格式语法通过编译语法，请提前使用之一方法。You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the methods. 若要创建从一个流，并指定要用来解析相对规则引用的基 URI 使用构造函数。To create a from a stream and specify a base URI to use to resolve relative rule references, use the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例从文件流加载本地 SRGS 文件 (cities.xml)，并指定要用作语法的根规则。The following example loads a local SRGS file (cities.xml) from a file stream and specifies a rule to use as the root of the grammar. Cities.xml 文件的内容显示在下面的 C# 示例的 XML 示例。The content of the cities.xml file appears in the XML example that follows the C# example. ```csharp // Load a cities grammar from an I/O stream, use a specific // rule as the root of the grammar, and return the new grammar. private static Grammar CreateGrammarFromStream2() { FileInfo file = new FileInfo(@"c:\temp\cities.xml"); Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(file.OpenRead(), "Main"); citiesGrammar.Name = "Stream Cities Grammar 2"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不将任何参数传递到初始化处理程序，并说明不应定义需要自变量的初始化处理程序。This constructor does not pass any parameters to the initialization handler, and the description should not define an initialization handler that requires arguments. 此构造函数可以创建实例从以下格式：This constructor can create a instance from the following formats: - 符合 W3C 的 XML 格式文件[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 已编译为.cfg 文件扩展名的二进制文件的语法Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension 此构造函数将编译到要由语音识别引擎加载和使用情况进行优化的二进制格式的 XML 格式语法文件。This constructor compiles XML-format grammar files to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine. 可以减少构建所需的时间量对象从一种 XML 格式语法通过编译语法，请提前使用之一方法。You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the methods. 若要创建，指定要用来解析相对规则引用、 打开文件的文件流和使用的基 URI构造函数。To create a that specifies a base URI to use to resolve relative rule references, open a file stream for the file and use the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例从文件加载本地 SRGS 文件 (cities.xml)，并指定要用作语法的根规则。The following example loads a local SRGS file (cities.xml) from a file and specifies a rule to use as the root of the grammar. Cities.xml 文件的内容显示在下面的 C# 示例的 XML 示例。The content of the cities.xml file appears in the XML example that follows the C# example. ```csharp // Load a cities grammar from a local file, use a specific // rule as the root of the grammar, and return the new grammar. private static Grammar CreateGrammarFromFile2() { Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(@"c:\temp\cities.xml", "Main"); citiesGrammar.Name = "SRGS File Cities Grammar 2"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不将任何参数传递到初始化处理程序，并说明不应定义需要自变量的初始化处理程序。This constructor does not pass any parameters to the initialization handler, and the description should not define an initialization handler that requires arguments. 此构造函数可以创建实例从以下格式：This constructor can create a instance from the following formats: - 符合 W3C 的 XML 格式文件[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 已编译为.cfg 文件扩展名的二进制文件的语法Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension 此构造函数将编译到要由语音识别引擎加载和使用情况进行优化的二进制格式的 XML 格式语法文件。This constructor compiles XML-format grammar files to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine. 可以减少构建所需的时间量对象从一种 XML 格式语法通过编译语法，请提前使用之一方法。You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the methods. 此构造函数不会验证`baseUri`。This constructor does not validate `baseUri`. 但是，`LoadGrammar`方法或对象将引发异常，如果它不能解决所有在语法描述中的规则引用。However, the `LoadGrammar` method of a or object throws an exception if it cannot resolve all of the rule references in the grammar description. 如果`baseUri`不是`null`，则`LoadGrammar`方法使用 URI 来解析否则无法解析的任何规则引用。If `baseUri` is not `null`, the `LoadGrammar` method uses the URI to resolve any rule references that it cannot otherwise resolve. 如果`baseUri`表示的文件，则`LoadGrammar`尝试解析相对规则引用时将使用指定的文件和文件的目录。If `baseUri` represents a file, then the `LoadGrammar` uses both the designated file and the file's directory when it attempts to resolve relative rule references. ## Examples 下面的示例从文件流加载本地 SRGS 文件 (shuttle.xml)。The following example loads a local SRGS file (shuttle.xml) from a file stream. 文件包含到 cities.xml 文件中的规则的相对规则引用，指定要用于解析规则引用的基 URI。The file contains a relative rule reference to a rule in the cities.xml file, and specifies a base URI to use to resolve the rule reference. Shuttle.xml 和 cities.xml 文件的内容显示在下面的 C# 示例的 XML 示例。The content of the shuttle.xml and cities.xml files appears in the XML examples that follow the C# example. ```csharp private static Grammar CreateGrammarFromStream3() { FileInfo file = new FileInfo(@".\shuttle.xml"); Uri baseUri = new Uri(@"file://c:\temp\"); Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(file.OpenRead(), null, baseUri); citiesGrammar.Name = "Stream Cities Grammar 3"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml Can I get a shuttle in ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

span.span: The property returns if a speech recognizer can perform recognition using the speech recognition grammar; otherwise the property returns .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual bool IsStg { get; }
.property instance bool IsStg
Protected Friend Overridable ReadOnly Property IsStg As Boolean
protected public: virtual property bool IsStg { bool get(); };
member this.IsStg : bool

summary.span: Gets whether a grammar is strongly typed.

span.span: Gets whether a grammar is strongly typed.

value.span: 属性返回如果语法是强类型; 否则该属性返回。

span.span: The property returns if the grammar is strongly-typed; otherwise the property returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 强类型对象 (`IsStg`等于`true`) 可以返回到客户端应用程序的强类型化结果 （对象，而非原始文本）。A strongly-typed object (`IsStg` equals `true`) can return strongly-typed results (objects, rather than raw text) to a client application. 例如，可能会返回强类型化语法对象而不是原始识别的输入。For example, a strongly-typed grammar might return objects rather than raw recognized input. 您可以通过将代码附加到的语法规则来实现强类型语法。You can implement strongly-typed grammars by attaching code to the rules of a grammar. 识别引擎处理任何给定的规则，作为采用输入当前部分结果、 执行关联的代码和文本信息变得丰富类型对象。As a recognition engine processes any given rule, taking as input the current partial results, the associated code is executed and the textual information becomes rich type objects. 这允许客户端要更轻松地使用增强的语义检查，支持针对多个区域性和内部语法逻辑。This allows a client to more easily make use of enhanced semantic checking, support for multiple cultures, and internal grammar logic. 强类型化的实例对象通常从程序集作为中的资源获取的公共语言运行时 (CLR)。Instances of strongly-typed objects are typically obtained from resources in an assembly as a of the Common Language Runtime (CLR). 使用以支持不同语言的本地化的类型是此类示例对象。The localized types used to support different languages are examples of such objects.

span.para: 继承的强类型化语法需要重写的默认行为，它将返回。
Strongly-typed grammars inheriting from need to override the default behavior of , which is to return .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本地化使用获得的语法`LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType`是通常强类型 (请参阅为强类型化语法的详细信息)。Localized grammars obtained with `LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType` are typically strongly-typed (see for more information on strongly typed grammars). 如果`onInitParameters`为空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing) 的本地化语法应具有没有初始化方法或不带参数的方法。If `onInitParameters` is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) the localized grammar should have either no initialization method, or a method that takes no arguments.

summary.span: The method initializes a strongly-typed grammar.

span.span: The method initializes a strongly-typed grammar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 强类型对象 (`IsStg`等于`true`) 可以返回到客户端应用程序的强类型化结果 （对象，而非原始文本）。A strongly-typed object (`IsStg` equals `true`) can return strongly-typed results (objects, rather than raw text) to a client application. 例如，可能会返回强类型化语法对象而不是原始识别的输入。For example, a strongly-typed grammar might return objects rather than raw recognized input. 您可以通过将代码附加到的语法规则来实现强类型语法。You can implement strongly-typed grammars by attaching code to the rules of a grammar. 识别引擎处理任何给定的规则，作为采用输入当前部分结果、 执行关联的代码和文本信息变得丰富类型对象。As a recognition engine processes any given rule, taking as input the current partial results, the associated code is executed and the textual information becomes rich type objects. 这允许客户端要更轻松地使用增强的语义检查，支持针对多个区域性和内部语法逻辑。This allows a client to more easily make use of enhanced semantic checking, support for multiple cultures, and internal grammar logic. 强类型化的实例对象通常从程序集作为中的资源获取的公共语言运行时 (CLR)。Instances of strongly-typed objects are typically obtained from resources in an assembly as a of the Common Language Runtime (CLR). 使用以支持不同语言的本地化的类型是此类示例对象。The localized types used to support different languages are examples of such objects.

span.para: 如果强类型化语法需要初始化，应在构造函数或初始化方法中调用。
If a strongly-typed grammar requires initialization, should be called in a constructor or an initialization method.

MemberSignature.Value: public float Weight { get; set; }
.property instance float32 Weight
Public Property Weight As Single
public: property float Weight { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.Weight : single with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the weight value of a object.

span.span: Gets or sets the weight value of a object.

value.span: 属性返回浮点值，该值指示当处理语音输入时，识别引擎实例应分配给语法的相对权重。

span.span: The property returns a floating point value indicating the relative weight that a recognition engine instance should assign to the grammar when processing speech input.
The range is from 0.0 to 1.0 inclusive.
The default is 1.0.
